subject: Baseball
Little League World Series
lead_paragraph: Danny Almonte's ability on the mound, at least by high school standards, and the notoriety attached to his name helped to explain the large turnout at the Bronx field only blocks from his home.
snippet: Danny Almonte's ability on the mound, at least by high school standards, and the notoriety attached to his name helped to explain the large turnout at the Bronx field only blocks from his home.
